channel.title: Item Equiptment Issues
channel.description:
I am using Galkon's Client v1.5, and I am setting wether or not the item ids are, hats, boots, amulets etc. in item.java, but it is not working. I added them to the item.cfg file and that did not work also. Does this have to be done within the client? If so how?
Thanks!

item.title: Item Equiptment Issues
item.dc:creator: @0.o 0.o
item.description:
@0.o wrote:

Yes, you have to put them in item4.java and take them out of the cape spot (were most mine were misplaced) also.

Read full topic

item.title: Item Equiptment Issues
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

nah just put it in item.java and item4 worked for me

Read full topic
